content.question: The Provisional Government in Russia (1917) failed primarily because

choices.label: it did not institute universal suffrage
it continued to pursue an unpopular war
it lost the support of the nobility by redistributing land to the peasants
its leaders insisted on "peace at any price" with Germany
its leaders attempted to reinstate the tsar

content.answer: it continued to pursue an unpopular war

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
